Text:
This is an awesome introduction and advanced tutorial on how to paint minatures!

Thx uploader!, plx seed this. I will definitely seed if I get to dl it :)

A huge thank you to the uploader!  Please though, can we get a reseed?  I'm happy to seed back for ages and ages if we do!

Thanks in advance

I got them from the linked torrent-page but the torrentrs dead there now. Still got the files so Ill seed for a while.

NOTE that the third movie is damaged, but I got a tip from a user on the other page:

"I unpacked it to c:\temp\vrepair and copied the vol3 file to c:\temp

Run this from a command prompt:

C:\Temp\vrepair>"C:\Temp\vrepair\movdump.exe" -i "C:\Temp\Hot Lead Vol.3.mp4" -o
"C:\Temp\repaired\Hot Lead Vol.3.mp4" -nfd   >> "C:\Temp\repaired\movdump.txt"

File plays fine now."
still at 99.9 , when a seed actually appears i can never connect to them.  :    my ports are open and i haven't had this on anything else i've downloaded in AGES.
